sentences.sContent: a colleague of mine from the bank
She discussed the idea with some of her colleagues.
sentences.sCn: 她和几位同事讨论了这个想法。

sentences.sContent: ...to finish a call with a client when a colleague in the next office starts screaming a subordinate...

remMethod.val: col(共同) ＋ league(联盟) → 在同一个联盟工作 → 同事

trans.tranOther: someone you work with – used especially by professional people
